content: in color b foot continue knitting the foot in color b until3 5 from desired foot length see note above now you will work the fade in reverse back to color a for the heel as follows attach color a and knit 1 round in color a knit 4 rounds in color b knit 2 rounds in color a knit 3 rounds in color b knit 3 rounds in color a now you will continue the fading into your mini gusset with color b at beginning of round m1r pm knit 28 30 32 34 36 38 this is your instep pm m1l knit to end of round color b round 2 k1 sm work instep sm k1 knit to end of round color a gusset round 3 m1r knit to marker sm work instep sm knit to end of instep m1l knit to end of round ©2022 holly isaac for personal use only hollyisaac on ravelry pattern support hollymocha3@gmail com 2 color a gusset round 4 knit slipping markers as you come to them repeat gusset rounds 3 and 4 one more time in color a then gusset round 3 in color b cut color b then gusset round 4 in color a then rounds 3-4 two more times in color a until there are 6 gusset stitches on either side of instep ending with round 4 a non-increase round in color a heel work across instep then work a shadow wrapshort row heel or any other short row heel over 28 30 32 34 36 38 st on heel side in color a row 1 rs knit 27 29 31 33 35 37 work ksw turn row 2 ws purl 26 28 30 32 34 36 work psw turn row 3 rs knit to one stitch before shadow wrapped stitch work ksw turn row 4 ws purl to one stitch before shadow wrapped stitch work psw turn repeat last 2 row until you have 9 10 10 11 12 13 shadow wrapped stitches on each side and 10 10 12 12 12 12 center stitches if you need a wider heel work fewer short row if you need a narrower heel work more short row now for the second half row 1 rs knit across center heel stitches to first shadow wrapped stitch knit that twinned stitch as one stitch be careful you don t knit that as two stitches and end up making an increase work tksw and turn row 2 ws purl to first shadow wrapped stitch purl that twinned stitch as one stitch work tpsw and turn row 3 rs knit across to the triplet stitch knit it as one stitch then work tksw in next shadow wrapped stitch and turn row 4 ws purl across to the triplet stitch purl it as one stitch then work tpsw in next shadow wrapped stitch and turn repeat row 3 and 4 until there is one triplet stitch left on each side having just completed row 4
